item.title: About
item.description: Hugo is a static site engine written in Go.

item.title: Testing CI of blog
item.description: Testing continuous integration of blog Another brief post in order to test whether the setup for CI through Travis is working properly. Some helpful links that I relied on to set everything up: https://stormpath.com/blog/ultimate-guide-deploying-static-site-aws http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/dev/website-hosting-cloudfront-walkthrough.html

item.title: Trying out blogdown
item.description: Introduction This is just a quick check to see if I can easily add posts to this blog using blogdown. With a lack of imagination, I’m using the mtcars data set and ggplot (via tidyverse) to check it’s working ok (using viridis for colours).
